import axios from'axios';var url='/api/persons';//as instructed in 2.16, similar as what was shown in the example. Due to a react warning I assigned the default exports to a variable first.
var getAllPersons=function getAllPersons(){var request=axios.get(url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var createPerson=function createPerson(newPerson){var request=axios.post(url,newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var updatePerson=function updatePerson(id,newPerson){var request=axios.put("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deletePerson=function deletePerson(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var exportDefault={getAllPersons:getAllPersons,createPerson:createPerson,updatePerson:updatePerson,deletePerson:deletePerson};export default exportDefault;
